Title: 37714 - How a Lack of Sleep Works Against You on the Job
Direction: 500 Words: Discuss 3-6 ways a lack of sleep can affect your job performance. There are millions of Americans that suffer from sleeping disorders or simply don't make enough time for sleep. Talk about the negative impact this has on your job performance. You can place client link by mentioning that a poor mattress choice can affect your sleep. Your target audience is age 18+ that are interested in pop culture and entertainment.

Title: 37715 - # Ways Sleep Impacts Your Everyday Life
Direction: 500 Words: Discuss 3-6 ways sleep affects your everyday life. Discuss the ways that having good or poor sleep habits can have an effect beyond just being tired or refreshed.You can place the client link by mentioning that  your choice of a mattress can affect your sleep. Your target audience is age 18+ that are interested in pop culture and entertainment.

Title: 37716 - The Sleepless Elite: Those That Think Sleep Is Overrated
Direction: 500 Words: Include 3-6 subheaders. Talk about people that don't need much sleep to keep going. There are people that have been nicknamed the sleepless elite that need very little sleep and still remain active and alert. Discuss this phenomenon and some of its advantages and/or disadvantages. You can place client link by mentioning that even if they don't get a lot of sleep, they need a quality mattress for when they do to get the most out of their time asleep. Your target audience is informed adults that are interested in current events and lifestyle topics.
